title: WAVE
creator: WebAIM
description: WAVE is a suite of tools for facilitating web accessibility evaluation by providing a visual representation of accessibility issues within the page. There is an online service at http://wave.webaim.org/, Firefox and Chrome extensions, and an online and installable API engine.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
assists: Modifying the presentation of web pages
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
